# Fishery Landings and Revenues

**Description** Commercial landings and revenue data are best summarized by the Pacific Fisheries Information Network (PacFIN; pacfin.psmfc.org), and recreational landings are best summarized by the Recreational Fisheries Information Network (RecFIN; www.recfin.org). Landings provide the best long-term indicator of fisheries removals. Revenues are calculated based on consumer price indices in 2023 dollars. Status and trends are estimated relative to a frame of reference of 1991-2020.
